main module¶

class main.Item(item)¶

Bases: StringFormat, TreeWalkingMethods

Item object storing slots and current part values

Fields:

  • name: string

  • name_short: string

  • has_required_slots:

  • part_type - string assigned by ReadType.read_type()

  • slots_dict: dict of enumerated slots instances

  • good_keys: set filled by ItemsTree backpropagation

  • conflictingItems: set read from properties. Extended by ItemsTree backpropagation.

  • ergo

  • recoil - %

  • acc - Modifier

  • default_preset - set of part names

pretty_print(extra_tab=0)¶

counter = {'adapter': 0, 'barrel': 0, 'device': 0, 'grip': 0, 'gun': 0, 'handguard': 0, 'magazine': 0, 'mod': 0, 'mount': 0, 'receiver': 0, 'sight': 0, 'stock': 0}¶

Counter of item types

do_tree_backpropagation()¶

Propagate sub parts types. Find parts that modify gun positively in any way and store key in ItemsTree.good_parts_keys

do_tree_check()¶

Method for testing tree propagation.

dump_weapons(directory)¶

Saves weapon params and slots into text file <path>tree.txt.

Parameters:

  • directory – path to directory

  • directory – string

euro = None¶

Current price in tarkovs ruble

find_best_brute(name, factor=2, weight_factor=0, praporLv=3, skierLv=3, mechanicLv=2, jaegerLv=2, peacekeeperLv=2, useDefault=True, limit_propagation=100, limit_top_propagation=10)¶
Parameters:

  • name –

  • factor (int) – 0: 3ergo, 1: 2ergo, 2: balanced, 3: 2recoil, 4: 3recoil

  • weight_factor –

  • praporLv –

  • skierLv –

  • mechanicLv –

  • jaegerLv –

  • peacekeeperLv –

  • useDefault –

    • Put default part if none is available

  • limit_propagation – Limit propagation by propagating n best

Returns:

class main.Slot(item)¶

Bases: StringFormat, TreeWalkingMethods

Slot stores information of subpart.

Fields:

  • name - string

  • name_id - string

  • required - bool

  • allowedItems - None or list of itemKeys

  • slot_type - string assigned by ReadType.read_type()

  • good_keys: set filled by ItemsTree.do_tree_backpropagation()
